/* PosBoardMapper.getPosBoardList */
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT twbi.BOARD_CD, twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO, twbi.TITLE || ' [' || twbi.ANSWER_CNT || ']' AS TITLE, twbi.VIEW_CNT, twbi.TARGET_FG, twbi.APPR_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_NM AS AGENCY_NM, twbi.USER_ID, twbi.USER_NM, (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(twbi.START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(twbi.END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AS NOTICE_DATE, twbi.REMARK, DECODE(twbrh.VIEW_YN, null, 'N', 'Y') AS VIEW_YN
FROM TB_WB_BOARD_INFO twbi, TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 twuidv01, ( SELECT BOARD_CD, BOARD_SEQ_NO, USER_ID, COUNT(IDX) AS VIEW_YN FROM TB_WB_BOARD_READNG_HIST WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY BOARD_CD, BOARD_SEQ_NO, USER_ID ) twbrh WHERE 1=1 AND twbi.BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND twbi.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twbi.APPR_FG = '2' AND ( ( twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'H' AND twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ( ( (twbi.TARGET_FG = '2') AND (twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO IN (SELECT BOARD_SEQ_NO FROM TB_WB_BOARD_PART_STORE WHERE BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND PART_ORGN_CD = UPPER(#{userId}) AND USE_YN = 'Y')) ) OR (twbi.TARGET_FG = '1') ) ) OR ( twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'S' AND twuidv01.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) )
AND twbi.START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND twbi.END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND twbi.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
AND twbi.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
AND twbi.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%' AND twbi.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
AND twuidv01.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
AND twuidv01.USER_ID (+)= twbi.USER_ID AND twbrh.BOARD_CD (+)= twbi.BOARD_CD AND twbrh.BOARD_SEQ_NO (+)= twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO ORDER BY twbi.MOD_DT DESC ) WHERE 1=1
AND VIEW_YN = #{gubunReadCombo}
